title: Font Categorization in Character Palette
content:
unless there’s something i don’t know, why do the CS products not support font categorization like fontexplorer does? by that i mean like the ’new set’ feature in the left hand frame of font explorer. it would so nice to see the folders you categorize typefaces into show up in the character pallette in CS apps. especially when you are using a certain set of fonts for a specific client and dont feel like scrolling through unuesed faces. i know turning fonts off would help, but still. why not sets in the palette?

\_will
